title: Collapse duplicate schemas in `allOf`
description: `allOf` with duplicate branches is redundant and can be collapsed.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Duplicate identical allOf branches
comprehensiveExamples.description: Remove exact duplicates; they add no value.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Semantically equivalent branches
comprehensiveExamples.description: Branches that accept the same instances are duplicates.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Complementary constraints
comprehensiveExamples.description: Distinct constraints that narrow the set together are valid.

message: Remove duplicate branches; keep one instance.
